tagline: See it before you paint it

visualizeThisColor: Visualize This Color on Your Walls
downloadMuroToSee: Download Muro for iPhone and iPad to see {{colorName}} in your space using advanced AI technology

footer.tagline: AI-powered wall color visualization. See it before you paint it.

hero.title: See it before you paint it
hero.subtitle: Pick a color. Point your phone. See it on your wall. No painting required.

about.label: About
about.title: What is Muro?
about.description: Muro shows you exactly how any paint color will look in your room before you buy a single can. Take a photo, pick a color from {{totalColors}}+ options (from brands like Sherwin-Williams, Benjamin Moore, Behr, Farrow & Ball), and see your wall transform in seconds. We preserve the shadows, the way light hits your wall, all of it.

howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Three steps to your perfect color
howItWorks.subtitle: Transform your space with our AI-powered visualization.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Point your phone at the wall. That's it. Doesn't matter if it's bright, dim, or whatever.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Browse {{totalColors}}+ real paint colors from Sherwin-Williams, Benjamin Moore, Behr. All the brands you know.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Your wall transforms in seconds. Swipe to compare before and after. It actually looks real.

features.label: Features
features.title: Everything you need to choose with confidence

realColors.title: Real paint colors
realColors.desc: Every color has a name and code you can buy at the store. No more guessing which "sage green" you saw online.

matchPhotos.title: Match colors from photos
matchPhotos.desc: Saw a color in a magazine or on Pinterest? Upload it. We'll find the closest real paint you can actually buy.

looksReal.title: Looks like the real thing
looksReal.desc: We keep the shadows, the light, all of it. Other apps just slap a filter on. Not us.

compare.title: Compare instantly
compare.desc: Swipe to see before and after. Makes it easy to decide if you really want that bold color.

save.title: Save everything
save.desc: Save your favorites. Compare options. Show your partner. You know, the important stuff.

whyMuro.label: Why Muro?
whyMuro.title: Why choose Muro over other paint visualizers?
whyMuro.reason1: It actually looks real. Other apps just slap a color filter on your photo. We preserve the shadows, the way light hits your wall, all of it.
whyMuro.reason2: Real paint you can buy. Every color has an actual name and code from brands like Sherwin-Williams, Benjamin Moore, Behr. No more guessing which "warm gray" you saw online.
whyMuro.reason3: See it in seconds. Not tomorrow. Not in an hour. Right now. Your wall transforms instantly.
whyMuro.reason4: Skip the sample pots. Test as many colors as you want without buying a single sample. Way cheaper, way faster.

cta.title: Ready to stop guessing?
cta.subtitle: Download Muro and start visualizing. See what that "moody blue" actually looks like before you commit.

questions.a: No, Muro requires a subscription. We offer weekly, monthly, and annual plans. Pick what works for you. Think of it as way cheaper than buying paint samples you'll never use.

Pretty accurate. We preserve your room's lighting, shadows, and details. Is it 100% perfect? No. Lighting changes throughout the day. But our users tell us the final result is very close to what they saw in the app.
30,000+ colors from Sherwin-Williams, Benjamin Moore, Behr, Farrow & Ball, Valspar, PPG, and lots of regional brands. We add new ones when people ask for them.

questions.q: Can I use colors from inspiration photos?
questions.a: Yep! Upload any photo from Pinterest, a magazine, wherever. We'll pull the color and find you the closest real paint match you can actually buy.
iPhone and iPad with iOS 16 or later. Works on both.

questions.q: How do I cancel my subscription?
questions.a: Go to iPhone Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions > Muro. Cancel anytime. You keep access until your current period ends. No hidden fees.

questions.q: Where are my photos stored? Is my data secure?
questions.a: Your photos never leave your control. All images are stored locally on your device and synced to your personal iCloud account for backup. When you transform a wall color, your photo goes directly to the AI processor and back to your device—it never touches our servers. We cannot view, access, or store your images. Ever.
